mapper.select: select orders.order_no,orders.account,orders.address_no,orders.order_time,orders.order_status,orders.express_no, SUM(order_details.goods_count) total_count,SUM(order_details.discount_price) total_money from orders,order_details where order_details.order_no=orders.order_no group by orders.order_no,orders.account,orders.address_no,orders.order_time,orders.order_status,orders.express_no;
